property.name: candle.width
property.description: Width of candle in the number of milliseconds

property.name: candle.date.from
property.description: First day of a time period (YYYYMMDD)

property.name: candle.date.to
property.description: First day after last day of a time period (YYYYMMDD)

property.name: candle.time.from
property.description: Start time (HHMM) of the first candle

property.name: candle.time.to
property.description: End time (HHMM) of the last candle
